info.title: Azure Cosmos DB for PostgreSQL
info.description: Azure Cosmos DB for PostgreSQL database service resource provider REST APIs

get.description: Lists all clusters in a subscription.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all clusters in a resource group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new cluster with servers.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for creating or updating a cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information about a cluster such as compute and storage configuration and cluster lifecycle metadata such as cluster creation date and time.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes a cluster together with servers in it.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates an existing cluster. The request body can contain one or several properties from the cluster definition.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The parameters for updating a cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information about a server in cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all the configurations of a server in cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all the configurations of a cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information of a configuration for coordinator and nodes.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information of a configuration for coordinator.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Updates configuration of coordinator in a cluster

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for updating a cluster configuration.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information of a configuration for worker nodes.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Updates configuration of worker nodes in a cluster

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for updating a cluster configuration.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new cluster firewall rule or updates an existing cluster firewall rule.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for creating or updating a firewall rule.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information about a cluster firewall rule.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all the firewall rules on cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information about a cluster role.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates a new role or updates an existing role.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for creating or updating a role.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: List all the roles in a given cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Restarts all nodes in the cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Starts stopped compute on all cluster nodes.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Stops compute on all cluster nodes.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Promotes read replica cluster to an independent read-write cluster.

parameters.name: promoteRequest
parameters.description: The parameter for enabling geo-redundant backup while promoting read replica.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Checks availability of a cluster name. Cluster names should be globally unique; at least 3 characters and at most 40 characters long; they must only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens; and must not start or end with a hyphen.

parameters.name: nameAvailabilityRequest
parameters.description: The required parameters for checking if cluster name is available.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all of the available REST API operations.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets list of private endpoint connections on a cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

200.description: Successfully retrieved a specified private endpoint connection.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Approves or Rejects a private endpoint connection with a given name.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The required parameters for approving a private endpoint connection.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes a private endpoint connection with a given name.

204.description: Private endpoint connection does not exist.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the private link resources for cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets a private link resource for cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

storageQuotaInMb.description: The storage of a server in MB.

vCores.description: The vCores count of a server.

enableHa.description: If high availability (HA) is enabled or not for the server.

enablePublicIpAccess.description: If public access is enabled on server.

isReadOnly.description: If server database is set to read-only by system maintenance depending on high disk space usage.

administratorLogin.description: The administrator's login name of the servers in the cluster.

ServerNameItem.description: The name object for a server.

fullyQualifiedDomainName.description: The fully qualified domain name of a server.

ClusterServerProperties.description: The properties of a server in cluster.

fullyQualifiedDomainName.description: The fully qualified domain name of a server.

role.description: The role of server in the cluster.

state.description: A state of a cluster/server that is visible to user.

haState.description: A state of HA feature for the cluster.

availabilityZone.description: Availability Zone information of the server.

postgresqlVersion.description: The major PostgreSQL version of server.

citusVersion.description: The Citus extension version of server.

ClusterServer.description: Represents a server in a cluster.

properties.description: The properties of a server in a cluster.

ClusterServerListResult.description: A list of servers in a cluster.

value.description: The list of servers in a cluster.

tags.description: Application-specific metadata in the form of key-value pairs.

ClusterPropertiesForUpdate.description: The properties used to update a cluster.

administratorLoginPassword.description: The password of the administrator login. Each cluster is created with pre-defined administrative role called citus.

postgresqlVersion.description: The major PostgreSQL version on all cluster servers.

citusVersion.description: The Citus extension version on all cluster servers.

enableShardsOnCoordinator.description: If distributed tables are placed on coordinator or not. Should be set to 'true' on single node clusters. Requires shard rebalancing after value is changed.

enableHa.description: If high availability (HA) is enabled or not for the cluster.

preferredPrimaryZone.description: Preferred primary availability zone (AZ) for all cluster servers.

coordinatorServerEdition.description: The edition of the coordinator (default: GeneralPurpose).

coordinatorStorageQuotaInMb.description: The storage of the coordinator in MB.

coordinatorVCores.description: The vCores count of the coordinator (max: 96).

coordinatorEnablePublicIpAccess.description: If public access is enabled on coordinator.

nodeServerEdition.description: The edition of a node (default: MemoryOptimized).

nodeCount.description: Worker node count of the cluster. When node count is 0, it represents a single node configuration with the ability to create distributed tables on that node. 2 or more worker nodes represent multi-node configuration. Node count value cannot be 1.

nodeStorageQuotaInMb.description: The storage in MB on each worker node.

nodeVCores.description: The compute in vCores on each worker node (max: 104).

nodeEnablePublicIpAccess.description: If public access is enabled on worker nodes.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of cluster list.

administratorLogin.description: The administrator's login name of the servers in the cluster.

administratorLoginPassword.description: The password of the administrator login. Required for creation.

state.description: A state of a cluster/server that is visible to user.

postgresqlVersion.description: The major PostgreSQL version on all cluster servers.

citusVersion.description: The Citus extension version on all cluster servers.

preferredPrimaryZone.description: Preferred primary availability zone (AZ) for all cluster servers.

enableShardsOnCoordinator.description: If distributed tables are placed on coordinator or not. Should be set to 'true' on single node clusters. Requires shard rebalancing after value is changed.

enableHa.description: If high availability (HA) is enabled or not for the cluster.

coordinatorServerEdition.description: The edition of a coordinator server (default: GeneralPurpose). Required for creation.

coordinatorStorageQuotaInMb.description: The storage of a server in MB. Required for creation. See https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/cosmos-db/postgresql/resources-compute for more information.

coordinatorVCores.description: The vCores count of a server (max: 96). Required for creation. See https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/cosmos-db/postgresql/resources-compute for more information.

coordinatorEnablePublicIpAccess.description: If public access is enabled on coordinator.

nodeServerEdition.description: The edition of a node server (default: MemoryOptimized).

nodeCount.description: Worker node count of the cluster. When node count is 0, it represents a single node configuration with the ability to create distributed tables on that node. 2 or more worker nodes represent multi-node configuration. Node count value cannot be 1. Required for creation.

nodeStorageQuotaInMb.description: The storage in MB on each worker node. See https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/cosmos-db/postgresql/resources-compute for more information.

nodeVCores.description: The compute in vCores on each worker node (max: 104). See https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/cosmos-db/postgresql/resources-compute for more information.

nodeEnablePublicIpAccess.description: If public access is enabled on worker nodes.

serverNames.description: The list of server names in the cluster

sourceResourceId.description: The resource id of source cluster for read replica clusters.

sourceLocation.description: The Azure region of source cluster for read replica clusters.

pointInTimeUTC.description: Date and time in UTC (ISO8601 format) for cluster restore.

readReplicas.description: The array of read replica clusters.

earliestRestoreTime.description: The earliest restore point time (ISO8601 format) for the cluster.

privateEndpointConnections.description: The private endpoint connections for a cluster.

databaseName.description: The database name of the cluster. Only one database per cluster is supported.

enableGeoBackup.description: If cluster backup is stored in another Azure region in addition to the copy of the backup stored in the cluster's region. Enabled only at the time of cluster creation.

MaintenanceWindow.description: Schedule settings for regular cluster updates.

customWindow.description: Indicates whether custom maintenance window is enabled or not.

startHour.description: Start hour within preferred day of the week for maintenance window.

startMinute.description: Start minute within the start hour for maintenance window.

dayOfWeek.description: Preferred day of the week for maintenance window.

serverRoleGroupConfigurations.description: The list of server role group configuration values.

Configuration.description: Represents configuration details for coordinator and node.

ServerRoleGroupConfiguration.description: Represents server role group configuration value.

role.description: The role of servers in the server role group.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.
Link to retrieve next page of results.

FirewallRuleProperties.description: The properties of a cluster firewall rule.

startIpAddress.description: The start IP address of the cluster firewall rule. Must be IPv4 format.

endIpAddress.description: The end IP address of the cluster firewall rule. Must be IPv4 format.

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the firewall rule.

properties.description: The properties of a firewall rule.

value.description: The list of firewall rules in a cluster.

password.description: The password of the cluster role. If an identity is used, password will not be required.

RoleProperties.description: The properties of a cluster role.

value.description: The list of roles in a cluster.

OperationDisplay.description: Display metadata associated with the operation.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed.

operation.description: Localized friendly name for the operation.

name.description: The name of the operation being performed on this particular object.

display.description: The localized display information for this particular operation or action.

isDataAction.description: Indicates whether the operation is a data action.

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation.

OperationListResult.description: A list of resource provider operations.

nextLink.description:
URL client should use to fetch the next page (per server side paging).
It's null for now, added for future use.

NameAvailabilityRequest.description: Request from client to check cluster name availability.

nameAvailable.description: Indicates whether the cluster name is available.

PrivateEndpointProperty.description: Property to represent resource id of the private endpoint.

id.description: Resource id of the private endpoint.

properties.description: Properties of the private endpoint connection.

PrivateEndpointConnectionListResult.description: List of private endpoint connections associated with the specified resource.

PrivateEndpointConnectionSimplePropertie.description: The properties in private endpoint connection

privateEndpoint.description: Private endpoint which the connection belongs to.

groupIds.description: Group ids of the private endpoint connection.

PrivateLinkResourceListResult.description: A list of private link resources.

PromoteRequest.description: Request from client to promote geo-redundant replica

ConfigurationNameParameter.name: configurationName
ConfigurationNameParameter.description: The name of the cluster configuration.

FirewallRuleNameParameter.name: firewallRuleName
FirewallRuleNameParameter.description: The name of the cluster firewall rule.

RoleNameParameter.name: roleName
RoleNameParameter.description: The name of the cluster role.

PrivateEndpointConnectionNameParameter.name: privateEndpointConnectionName
PrivateEndpointConnectionNameParameter.description: The name of the private endpoint connection associated with the cluster.

PrivateLinkResourceName.name: privateLinkResourceName
PrivateLinkResourceName.description: The name of the private link resource.
